select distinct equip_code_s, equip_name_s from AT_MX_PP_WO_EDIT where WO_DATE_S >=:begindate and WO_DATE_S <=:enddate and S_FACTORY_S=2 and wo_type_s = '051003'
select distinct recipe_code_s,spare8_s from AT_MX_PP_WO_EDIT where WO_DATE_S >=:begindate and WO_DATE_S <=:enddate and S_FACTORY_S=2 and qty_complete_i > 0 and wo_type_s = '051003'
select distinct recipe_code_s,spare8_s from AT_MX_PP_WO_EDIT where WO_DATE_S >=:begindate and WO_DATE_S <=:enddate and EQUIP_CODE_S=:equipcode and S_FACTORY_S=2 and qty_complete_i > 0
